## SIP.upload() function

Upload the results of an accessibility check to the Siteimprove Intelligence Platform (SIP) API. Returns the URL of a Page Report showing the audit results.

**Signature:**

```typescript
function upload(audit: Audit | Audit.JSON, options: Options): Promise<Result<string, Array<string>>>;
```
